title: Grilled salmon with tempura prawns
description: James Martin makes a simple but impressive starter or light meal of salmon flavoured with vanilla and king prawns.
ingredients: 1 mango, peeled, stone removed, cut into 0.5cm/¼in dice
500g/1lb 2oz salmon fillet, pin bones and skin removed, cut into 0.5cm/¼in thick slices
1 vanilla pod, split, seeds scraped out with a knife
12 raw king prawns, heads and shells removed, deveined
